bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: tf.Model.evaluateDataset() errors out when no option argument is provided.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
0.14.2 Currently, you can't do model.fitDataset(dataset), you have to provide an empty config object as the second arg: model.fitDataset(dataset, {}). The first case should work, if dataset provides a done signal to indicate the end of the iterations.
